snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s promise to match $250,000 in donations to Planned Parenthood, after the Komen foundation’s withdrawal, turned into one of his biggest political coups in years.
abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's $250,000 pledge to Planned Parenthood becomes his biggest political coup in years, giving him a much-needed boost on the national stage; pledge was made after breast cancer advocacy group Susan G Komen for the Cure made a controversial cut in its funding to Planned Parenthood.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s promise to match $250,000 in donations to Planned Parenthood, after the Komen foundation’s withdrawal, turned into one of his biggest political coups in years.
